content: > **subscribe to my newsletter and get an exclusive 50% off coupon code for your first purchase > subscribe here 2 ** the bohemian mosaic crochet rectangle placemat pattern is made using the overlay mosaic crochet method and is an intermediate skill level if you haven t tried mosaic crochet before don t worry there will be a video tutorial for the first part available on the blog i invite you to join this event and learn a new technique the pdf pattern includes both written instructions and a chart the video tutorial for the first part of the placemat can be found here https //youtu be/luqeeare66s - skill level - intermediate - the pattern is written using english u s terminology - hook size needed 3 0 mm / d - the placemat is crocheted with sport #2 weight yarn total amount of yarn needed color a main 100gr/250m/274yds color b sides 50gr/125m/137yds color c middle 50gr/125m/137yds - finished size- 15 3×12 2 39×31 cm if you have any questions regarding the pattern feel free to contact me copyright © 2022 gootie agat rottman-cassel all rights reserved the pattern and photos in this pattern are property of gootie you can sell the finished product on a small scale if you write about this product online please give credit to the original pattern please note that there is only a certain amount of variations possible when one crochets and any similarities to other patterns are purely coincidental to the best of my knowledge this pattern is my original unique design return/refund policy due to the fact that it is impossible to return a digital file all sales are final 1 https //madebygootie com/crochet/mosaic-crochet-placemat-pattern-2/ 2 https //madebygootie myflodesk com/ravelry-sign-up
